key_points.point: Multiple connectivity options (Bluetooth, Wi-Fi dongle, wired)

verdict: Generally positive, with users appreciating the versatility of connectivity options. Some connectivity issues were reported.

key_points.point: Compatibility with multiple platforms (PC, Android, iOS, Nintendo Switch)

verdict: Positive feedback on the controller's ability to work across different platforms.

key_points.point: Grip comfort for extended gaming sessions
Button placement issues causing discomfort after prolonged use

verdict: Mostly positive, with good grip comfort mentioned. Some users experienced discomfort with button placement after long use.

key_points.point: Durability of the left and right bumpers is a concern
Malfunctioning analog sticks after a few days of use

verdict: Mixed reviews. While responsive, some users reported issues with button durability and analog stick functionality.

key_points.point: Battery drain when the controller is accidentally activated
Ability to use the controller while charging

verdict: Inconsistent feedback. Some users reported good battery life, while others experienced poor battery life or battery drain issues.
